input_args.passage: 'Church of St. Mary of the Spring (Istanbul) | The church is located in Istanbul, in the district of Zeytinburnu, in the neighbourhood of Balıklı, along Balıklı Sivrikapı Sokak. It lies a few hundred meters ...'
input_args.claim: 'The second source further specifies that the local name of the church is Balıklı Meryem Ana Rum Ortodoks monasteries and it is also known as Monestry of Our Lady of Spring.'
